headline: Should You Reconsider Dominion Energy After 15% Gains and Business Restructuring News?
summary: Wondering if Dominion Energy is a hidden gem or just another utility stock? You are not alone. Many investors are asking whether now is the time to buy. The stock has seen a noticeable upswing lately, climbing 1.7% this past week and 6.0% over the last month, with year-to-date gains now hitting 15.0%. Much of this movement follows headlines about Dominion restructuring its business and exploring asset sales, which has investors speculating on improved financial health and streamlined...
